author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new testing code for HCAL SimHits and rearrange some of the files from test to plugins directory

#### PR validation:

Tested using cfg files in Validation/HcalHits/test

title: run3-hcx296 Add a new testing code and rearrange some of the files
